key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and semiconductor shortages
Regulatory and legal risks from changes in requirements and intellectual property disputes
Dependence on the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors for revenue
Intense competitive pressures from companies like Agilent and Thermo Fisher Scientific
controversies: Settlement in a class-action lawsuit alleging mismanagement of the $1.2 billion retirement fund, involving claims of excessive fees and underperforming funds
environmental_issues: Significant progress in sustainability, including a 36% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions and alignment with Science-Based Targets initiative (SBTi) criteria
social_issues: Critical role in supporting COVID-19 research and vaccine development, driving increased demand for analytical instruments
governance_issues: Legal actions and settlements related to retirement fund mismanagement and regulatory compliance risks
